profile:
At Hometurf Lawn Care, we have been treating the lawns of our loyal customers for over 30 years. As a family-owned and -operated business, we have grown by delivering lush, healthy, green lawns while using only the highest quality products applied by professional lawn care technicians. Let us help you make your lawn look its best this season!

Our season-long lawn care programs take the guess work out of which products to use and when. Applications are scheduled to be applied four to six weeks apart throughout the season for optimal turf care. We strive to ensure everything your lawn needs is included in our programs. No telemarketing or sales calls pushing unnecessary extras.

Our services include: lawn care programs, lawn maintenance programs, fertilizer, weed control, insect control, aeration, grass seeding, dethatching, top dressing, chinch bug control and grub control.

profile:
Bradshaw Landscaping is family owned and operated. We provide full service commercial and residential landscaping and lawn care maintenance. We are dedicated to the idea of ease of use. Let us work with you and continuously earn your business on your terms. We are a fully licensed and insured company with health and safety plan in place. The mission of Bradshaw Landscaping is to educate every customer with our professional, friendly. and courteous staff. No one likes long-term contracts, as a Residential client you have the option to add or discontinue services at anytime. With continuous training and educating all of our techs in the ever changing government laws and certifications, we are always improving to bring you the very best in quality service. Residential and Commercial Maintenance:
Lawn Mowing, Trimming, Bed Maintenance, Spring/Fall Cleanup,
Bush & Hedge Trimming, Seasonal Colour, Turf Enhancement,
De-thatching, Overseeding, Pest Control, Weed Control, Fertilizer,
Snow Removal.

specialities: We offer a NO CONTRACT policy for all a weekly residential lawn maintenance customers. Bradshaw Landscaping wants to earn your business every time we step on your property. That takes the risk off the customer for getting locked in to a long term contract with a company your not happy with. Some company's offer guarantees but for are lawn care customers we prove it!!!!!!! Maybe you do not need weekly service every week let us service you only when you need us.
